cast.overview: On October 13, 1972, Uruguayan Air Force Flight 571, chartered to take a rugby team to Chile, crashes into a glacier in the heart of the Andes.
cast.title: Society of the Snow

details.biography: Noelia Campo (Montevideo, August 17, 1976) is a Uruguayan theater and film actress and television presenter. In 1999 she graduated from theater school and university, where she obtained a Bachelor's degree in Social Communication. For more than a decade she hosted the music program Va por Vos. She was the winner of the Florencio award for Best Actress in 2012.
details.name: Noelia Campo
